uk.org.iscream.vrmlgraph
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.org.iscream.vrmlgraph.Node
public class Node
extends java.lang.Object

The Node class acts as an object to store information about nodes.

Author:
Paul James Mutton, paul@i-scream.org.uk
